          <title>
            <string language="en">Seeing things: light reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen von von Sachen: helle Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voir des choses : réflexion légère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vendo coisas: reflexão clara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedere le cose: riflessione chiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δει τα πράγματα: ελαφριά 
αντανάκλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ver cosas: reflexión ligera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing that you can see things because light is reflected and goes into your eyes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eyes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die zeigen, daß Sie
Sachen sehen können, weil Licht reflektiert wird und in Ihre Augen 
einsteigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations prouvant que vous 
pouvez voir des choses parce que la lumière est réfléchie et entre 
dans vos yeux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram 
que você pode ver coisas porque a luz é refletida e entra em seus 
olhos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che indicano 
che potete vedere le cose perché la luce è riflessa ed entra nei 
vostri occhi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που δείχνουν ότι μπορείτε να 
δείτε τα πράγματα επειδή το φως απεικονίζεται και 
πηγαίνει στα μάτια σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran que 
usted puede ver cosas porque la luz se refleja y entra sus ojos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lampe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
